body:
You can find all the versions on github release pages. Here is 8.2.0 update 1:

[https://github.com/NREL/EnergyPlus/releases/tag/v8.2.0-Update-1.2](https://github.com/NREL/EnergyPlus/releases/tag/v8.2.0-Update-1.2)



And here is the rest:

[https://github.com/NREL/EnergyPlus/releases?after=v8.2.0-Validation4](https://github.com/NREL/EnergyPlus/releases?after=v8.2.0-Validation4)
